price: 97. Waxay yidhaahdeen: U dhisa meel (dab lagu shido) kuna tuura dabkaa ololaya.
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
